statements: SELECT * FROM files_and_documents;
SELECT file_name, file_type, upload_date FROM files_and_documents WHERE file_type = 'PDF';
SELECT file_name, description FROM files_and_documents WHERE upload_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT file_name, file_type, shared_with FROM files_and_documents ORDER BY shared_with DESC;
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_type, upload_date, description FROM files_and_documents WHERE file_type LIKE 'image%';
SELECT file_id, file_name, upload_date FROM files_and_documents WHERE file_type = 'PDF';
SELECT file_name, description FROM files_and_documents WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM files_and_documents WHERE file_type LIKE '%doc%' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, description, upload_date FROM files_and_documents WHERE shared_with = 'John Doe' AND upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_type, description, upload_date, shared_with FROM files_and_documents WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY file_id ASC;
SELECT file_id, file_name, uploaded_at FROM files;
SELECT * FROM files WHERE uploaded_by_user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT file_id, file_name, uploaded_at FROM files ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM team_members WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT file_id, file_name, uploaded_at FROM files WHERE file_path LIKE '%documents%';
SELECT file_name, uploaded_at FROM files WHERE uploaded_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_path FROM files JOIN team_members ON files.uploaded_by_user_id = team_members.user_id
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer' ORDER BY user_name ASC
SELECT file_name, COUNT(*) AS total_uploads FROM files GROUP BY file_name HAVING total_uploads > 2
SELECT * FROM Files;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM Files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, created_at FROM Files WHERE file_type = 'PDF';
SELECT * FROM Teams ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM Teams WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Files WHERE file_type = 'PDF' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM Files WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, team_size FROM Teams WHERE team_size >= 5;
SELECT member_name, role FROM TeamMembers WHERE team_id = '08a6cda9-3f70-4f17-892a-88e2b79d57ab';
SELECT * FROM Files JOIN TeamMembers ON Files.file_id = TeamMembers.member_id ORDER BY Files.created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, uploaded_by FROM files WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_size FROM files ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT document_title, created_by, creation_date FROM documents WHERE document_content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT member_name, role, department FROM team_members WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM files WHERE file_id = 1;
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM documents WHERE created_by = 'Alice';
SELECT role, email FROM team_members WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT file_name, file_size, upload_date FROM files WHERE file_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT file_name, uploaded_by, shared_with, shared_date FROM files f JOIN shared_files sf ON f.file_id = sf.file_id;
SELECT * FROM files;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM files ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_lead FROM teams WHERE num_members > 5;
SELECT member_name, team_name, role FROM members JOIN teams ON members.team_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT file_name, permission_type FROM files JOIN file_permissions ON files.id = file_permissions.file_id JOIN permissions ON file_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM files WHERE id = 1;
SELECT file_name, file_type, created_at FROM files WHERE file_type = 'document';
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE team_name LIKE '%engineering%';
SELECT file_name, uploaded_by FROM files ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT team_name, team_lead FROM teams INNER JOIN members ON teams.team_id = members.team_id WHERE members.role = 'manager';
